name: Admin Widget for WordPress Portugal News
author: Zé Fontainhas

sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Can I fork it?

Yes, you can.

Wait a minute, that’s not your code. I saw it on WP-something-or other dot com

That’s not a question.

Whence did you steal this code?

Given that I’ve reached the bookmark-overdose level, I can’t really remember. However, if you are the original author of the code, please get in touch so that I can give you proper credit.

Why do just one hook and one function need to be a class?

I don’t want to anger Nacin.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Compatibility with WordPress 5.9.3
  • Review coding standards

1.0.1

  • Now improved with code that actually works

1.0

  • Initial version
sections.description: Adds a widget to your dashboard screen, with the latest news from http://wp-portugal.com/
